00017 typedef long counter;       /* a bit excessive, perhaps... */
00018 typedef struct _mc {
00019     struct _mc *next;   /* used for doubly-linked list */
00020     struct _mc *prev;   /* of all mcs */
00021     size_t itemSize;    /* the size of the object this MCon controls */
00022     void *freeList;     /* a free list of objects */
00023     counter nGiven;     /* number of items handed out */
00024     counter nOut;       /* number still out there somewhere */
00025     counter nFree;      /* length of free list */
00026 } *MCon;
